description_for_human: Capture ideas, articles, and questions throughout the day. Listen to them as audio episodes on your commute.
description_for_model: DriveTime helps users capture ideas, articles, questions, and notes throughout the day. When they're ready (like on their commute), it can read these back as audio episodes. Use show_drivetime to open the widget, get_todays_episodes to see what's queued, get_episode_content to read an episode aloud, mark_episode_complete when done, and add_to_queue to add new content.
